game.name: DCS: Normandy 2.0
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, LAN PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 캡션 이용 가능, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함
game.shortDescription: DCS: Normandy 2.0 includes large parts of the territory of France and Great Britain, including the capitals of these countries - Paris and London.
game.shortDescriptionEn: DCS: Normandy 2.0 includes large parts of the territory of France and Great Britain, including the capitals of these countries - Paris and London.
